definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
rather than.../與其|与其[yu3 qi2] A 不如[bu4 ru2] B (rather than A, better to B)
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
variant of 贈予|赠予[zeng4 yu3]
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
things turn out contrary to the way one wishes (idiom)
to be cut off from the rest of the world (idiom)
to stand aloof from worldly affairs

sentences.english: He transacts business with a large number of stores.
sentences.chinese: 他与很多商店进行交易。

sentences.english: On the grounds of modern emergency medicine, defibrillation has to be performed in combination with CPR.
sentences.chinese: 根据现代急救理念，电除颤必须与心肺复苏联合应用。

sentences.english: They're less likely to nitpick about details that aren't relevant at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 减少他们在与主题不相关的细节上的吹毛求疵。

sentences.english: Compare the two values we found that they are anastomose essentially.
sentences.chinese: 实验室试验数据与仿真结果比较，二者基本吻合。

sentences.english: China stands ready to earnestly implement the agreement together with Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 中方愿与越方共同努力，认真落实协议。

sentences.english: The first memory bank corresponding to a first range of addresses.
sentences.chinese: 第一存储体与第一范围的地址相对应。

sentences.english: The second is that a systematic error exists, resulting from the attrition voltage and contact electric potential difference.
sentences.chinese: 存在一个由消耗电压与接触电势差导致的系统误差。

sentences.english: He came to welcome me with a handshake.
sentences.chinese: 他来与我握手表示欢迎。

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 后印象派反映了大量与文学象征主义相似的态度。

sentences.english: This is the website for International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 这是国际理论与应用化学联合会的网站。

sentences.english: An application that can run statics analysis on sports matches .
sentences.chinese: 一个应用程序可以运行在体育静力学的研究与分析。

sentences.english: Hanna, female, a master graduate in vacuum and fluid engineering center.
sentences.chinese: 韩娜，女，真空与流体工程研究中心硕士研究生。

sentences.english: Inspired by a cross between a fusebox and a prison.
sentences.chinese: 那灵感是来自保险丝盒与监狱的杂交么。

sentences.english: Star Wars are closely linked to conventional ground-combat.
sentences.chinese: 星球大战与地面常规作战之间有着密切的联系。

sentences.english: To clarify the safety of Monascus and Chinese traditional medicine synbiotics.
sentences.chinese: 阐明红曲霉与健胃中药合生素的安全性。

sentences.english: The Restoration is an important transformable age in the history of finance and taxation in England .
sentences.chinese: 复辟时期是英国财政与税收史上的一个重要转型时代。

definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
rather than.../與其|与其[yu3 qi2] A 不如[bu4 ru2] B (rather than A, better to B)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
